The default client id is only for testing purposes. We highly recomend generating your own client id when you're store is live. Each client id has a limit request per hour so by creating your own you'll have a more reliable instagram feed. Step 1 - [Go here](http://instagram.com/developer) and then click the Register Your Application button. Fill in the form and complete the authorisation Step 2 - [Click here](http://instagram.com/developer/clients/register/) to create a new Client ID. Use any name, and description. Use your store url for the website and OAuth redirect_uri. Make sure to untick the two boxes 'Disable implicit OAuth' & 'Enforce signed header'. Step 3 - Copy and paste your Client Id into the box below.
